credit_line: Gift of Edmund Seymour, Class of 1882
dimensions:
Overall: 7 3/16 in. (18.2 cm)
rim: 4 13/16 in. (12.3 cm)
title: Ramos Polychrome ware
description: Decorated in alternate squares of plain red and checker board design in black and near white.  Putty colored slip.  Geometric design on lip extends inside lip also.  Bottom is plain in putty colored slip.
